com.axelor.studio.service

Class ViewRecorderService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.axelor.studio.service.ModuleRecorderService
      • com.axelor.studio.service.ViewRecorderService

  • public class ViewRecorderService
extends ModuleRecorderService
    This service class handle all view side processing. It call recording of different types of ViewEditor. Provides common method to create view and action xml for all types of view. It also call Menu and RightMangement processing.
    Author:
    axelor

    • Method Detail

      • record

        public boolean record(boolean updateMetaViews)
        Root method to access the service. It split ViewEditor according to model for processing. Call methods to process permissions and menus.
        Parameters:
        updateMetaViews -
        Returns:

      • updateEdited

        public void updateEdited(java.util.List<ViewEditor> viewEditors,
                boolean updateMeta)
        Update 'edited' boolean of ViewEditor to false and 'recorded' to true if not updateMeta. Method called at the end of ViewEditor processing.
        Parameters:
        viewEditors - List of ViewEditors.
        updateMeta - Boolean to check if only to update 'edited' boolean or 'recorded' too.

      • generateMetaAction

        Parameters:

      • processView

        private void processView(java.lang.String model,
               java.util.List<ViewEditor> viewEditors)
                  throws javax.xml.bind.JAXBException,
                         java.io.IOException
        Method to process ViewEditor according to its type. It will call method to create view xml and generate MetaView.
        Parameters:
        model - Name of model.
        viewEditors - List of ViewEditors to process.
        Throws:
        javax.xml.bind.JAXBException - Xml processing exception
        java.io.IOException - File handling exception

      • writeView

        private void writeView(java.lang.String name,
             java.util.List<com.axelor.meta.schema.views.AbstractView> views,
             java.util.List<com.axelor.meta.schema.actions.Action> actions)
                throws java.io.IOException,
                       javax.xml.bind.JAXBException
        Write view and action xml into new viewFile.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of model
        views - List of AbstractView of models.
        actions - List of Actions of model.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        javax.xml.bind.JAXBException

        Parameters:

      • filterOldViews

        private java.util.List<com.axelor.meta.schema.views.AbstractView> filterOldViews(java.util.List<com.axelor.meta.schema.views.AbstractView> views,
                                                                       java.util.List<com.axelor.meta.schema.views.AbstractView> oldViews)
        Replace old views from extracted views of existing view file with new AbstractViews.
        Parameters:
        views - List of new AbstractView created.
        oldViews - Old List of AbstractView from existing view file.
        Returns:
        Updated list of old and new AbstractView.

      • filterOldActions

        private java.util.List<com.axelor.meta.schema.actions.Action> filterOldActions(java.util.List<com.axelor.meta.schema.actions.Action> actions,
                                                                     java.util.List<com.axelor.meta.schema.actions.Action> oldActions)
        Replace old Action from ViewFile with New Action.
        Parameters:
        actions - List of new Actions created
        oldActions - List of old Actions extracted from file.
        Returns:
        List of updated list containing both old and new actions.
